definition: half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half
lifetime/generation/group of people/class/classifier for generations/(literary) classifier for people

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: I was an atheist and evolutionist most of my life.
sentences.chinese: 我大半輩子都是個無神論進化論者。

sentences.english: What you know about bein bullied over half your life?
sentences.chinese: 你知道半輩子都被人欺負的滋味嗎？

sentences.english: For pretty much my entire life, she was a college math professor (and still is).
sentences.chinese: 在我的大半輩子裏，她始終是一名大學的數學教授。

sentences.english: Don't waste years of it chasing other people's goals. Take the time to decide what you want, and go after it wholeheartedly.
sentences.chinese: 不要辛苦了大半輩子結果卻是在追求別人的人生目標。

sentences.english: After roaming around nearly half his life, he finally settled down in Canada.
sentences.chinese: 半輩子的流浪生活，最後在加拿大定居了下來。

sentences.english: For much of his life he suffered from recurrent bouts of depression.
sentences.chinese: 他的大半輩子反覆發作抑鬱症。

sentences.english: Why I have spent half my life ascending upward.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼我花了大半輩子拾級而上。

sentences.english: Most of her life was spent in caring for others.
sentences.chinese: 她大半輩子的時間都用來照顧別人了。

sentences.english: After roaming around nearly half his life, he finally settled down in Quebec.
sentences.chinese: 他過了半輩子的流浪生活，最後在魁北克定居了下來。

sentences.english: It's pathetic that human beings should be condemned to spend the greater part of their lives amid such surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 悲慘的是，人的大半輩子竟被禁錮在這種環境裏。

sentences.english: that's not what I wanted to be doing for the rest of my life.
sentences.chinese: 我不想下半輩子都做這行。

sentences.english: Then you ll spend the rest of your life looking over your shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 拮果您得花調下半輩子的時間回頭看。

sentences.english: Something tells us you’ll live to regret it.
sentences.chinese: 你要有了這些紋身，你下半輩子都會後悔的。

sentences.english: Most of her life was spent in bed.
sentences.chinese: 她的大半輩子都是在牀上度過的。
真愛，半輩子了，終於找到了。

sentences.english: After roaming around nearly half his his life, he finally settled down in Canadan.
sentences.chinese: 他過了半輩子流浪生活，最後在加拿大定居下來。
